name: Eldoria
description: A high-fantasy realm filled with magic, dragons, and ancient kingdoms. The realm is divided into several regions, each with its own unique culture and dangers.

entities.name: The Whispering Woods
entities.summary: An ancient forest where the trees are said to whisper secrets to those who listen. Many adventurers have entered but few have returned with their sanity intact.

entities.name: Dragon's Peak
entities.summary: The highest mountain in Eldoria, home to the last known dragon. The peak is shrouded in eternal mist and protected by powerful magic.

entities.name: The Royal Capital of Aetheria
entities.summary: The grand capital city of the human kingdom, built around a massive crystal that powers the city's magical defenses. Home to the High Council of Mages.

entities.name: Ancient Red Dragon
entities.summary: The last of the great dragons, an ancient and wise being who has watched over Eldoria for millennia. Possesses immense magical power and knowledge of forgotten lore.

entities.name: Forest Spirits
entities.summary: Mystical beings that inhabit the Whispering Woods. They are guardians of nature and can be either helpful guides or dangerous protectors depending on how they are approached.

entities.name: Crystal Golems
entities.summary: Magical constructs created by the High Council to guard important locations. They are nearly indestructible and powered by the same crystal energy that protects Aetheria.

entities.name: The High Council of Mages
entities.summary: The ruling body of Aetheria, composed of the most powerful wizards in the realm. They maintain the magical defenses and govern the use of magic throughout the kingdom.

entities.name: The Dragon Guardians
entities.summary: A secretive order dedicated to protecting the last dragon and preserving ancient knowledge. They operate from hidden sanctuaries throughout Eldoria.

entities.name: The Shadow Thieves
entities.summary: A criminal organization that operates in the darker corners of Eldoria. They deal in stolen magical artifacts and information, and have connections in every major city.

campaigns.name: Rise of the Dragon King
campaigns.summary: A long-running campaign about ancient draconic power returning to the realm. The party must uncover the truth behind the disappearance of the last dragon lord and prevent a catastrophic war.

scenes.name: The Ancient Prophecy
scenes.summary: The party discovers an ancient scroll foretelling the return of the Dragon King. They must decipher its meaning before their enemies do.

scenes.name: The First Sign
scenes.summary: Strange phenomena begin occurring across the realm - earthquakes, unusual weather patterns, and sightings of draconic creatures.

scenes.name: Meeting the Oracle
scenes.summary: The party seeks out a reclusive oracle who may hold the key to understanding the prophecy.

storyArcs.name: The Prophecy Arc
storyArcs.summary: Uncovering the truth behind the ancient prophecy and its connection to the Dragon King's return.
